snippet: Prime Minister Hun Sen has ordered an investigation into the death of a prominent environmentalist during a confrontation with military police.
abstract: Cambodian Prime Min Hun Sen orders an investigation into the death of prominent environmentalist Chut Wutty during a confrontation with military police.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Hun Sen has ordered an investigation into the death of a prominent environmentalist during a confrontation with military police.

headline.seo: Investigation Ordered in Killing of Chut Wutty in Cambodia
headline.main: Cambodia: Investigation Ordered in Killing of Activist
headline.print_headline: Cambodia: Investigation Ordered in Killing of Activist
